item.title: Republicans invoke ‘nuclear option’ in push to change Senate rules
item.description: The rules change will allow the Senate to confirm multiple nominees at once, helping to clear a backlog of nearly 150 nominees awaiting floor votes.

item.title: Republicans name members to new Jan. 6 committee
item.description: Democrats and Republicans will participate in a GOP-led reinvestigation of the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.

item.title: Nadine Menendez, wife of ex-senator, sentenced to 4½ years
item.description: She was convicted in April for her part in a bribery scandal that led to her husband, former U.S. senator Bob Menendez, being sentenced to prison for ...

item.title: What a Virginia Democrat’s decisive win may mean for midterm elections
item.description: Democrat James Walkinshaw handily won a recent special election in Virginia’s 11th Congressional District with a message focused on job loss from Trum...

item.title: To Vance, Charlie Kirk was not just a political ally. He was a friend.
item.description: The vice president and the conservative activist, who was killed Wednesday, had a friendship that went back almost a decade.
